DOC.brief_summary: The desogestrel ( 150 mg ) combination ethinyl estradiol ( EE , 30 mg ) know Marvelon European country . Previous study reveal Marvelon good safe woman . As study Thailand show Marvelon effective acceptable Thai woman . Moreover compare Caucasian woman , incidence irregular bleed side effect apparently low Asian woman . DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Oral Contraceptive Containing 30 mg Ethinyloestradiol 150 mg Desogestrel Women 's Health
DOC.criteria: marry , within 1840 year old , normal Body mass index ( range 20 27 kg/m2 ) , n't use OCP 3 month ago , normal menstruation cycle last three cycle , least one follow mental behavioural symptom ( Fatigue , mood change , lack energy , irritability , aggression , depression , decrease concentration , decrease social relationship , greed increase appetite eat food ) , least one follow physical symptom ( Breast sensitivity , swell flatulence ) woman tend use OCP six consecutive month . pregnancy , Anorexia Bulimia , breastfeeding , smoke cigarette , Taking sleep pill 3 day per month , Injection estrogen , progesterone androgen past 3 month , Contraindications OCP ( include : thrombophlebitis Severe liver disease cerebrovascular accident heart disease unexplained uterine bleeding lupus breast cancer migraine sickle cell anemia Epilepsy gallbladder disease kidney problem varicocele family history thrombosis ) .
